channel.title: Saradomin godsword logoff?
channel.description: there is a sgs spec but if u use it on players or at fight pits it logs everyone off,how can i fix this,,,,

item.title: Saradomin godsword logoff?
item.dc:creator: @mylust4blood mylust4blood
item.description:
@mylust4blood wrote:

well the problem is that a guess ur using augeas pkz source and really the fighting pits is not 100% done

that fighting pits u have is mabe a 75%?

if i were u i would take out the pits command and tele and wait till someone finds a code =/

item.title: Saradomin godsword logoff?

item.description:
@poopsicle100 wrote:

i was just about to post this idk if itll help

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount <= 50) {//sara godsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount >= 50) {//sara godsword startAnimation(2876); if (misc.random(6) == 1) { specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(40); specialAmount -=75; } else { specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 50; } }

item.title: Saradomin godsword logoff?
item.dc:creator: @stuckaduck stuckaduck
item.description:
@stuckaduck wrote:

You probably have an error in your special attack coding. The fastest way to fix would be to comment out that part of your code and then try to fix the special attack. If you post the coding for the special attack I might be able to assist you in fixing it.

Read full topic
